item.title: Much of Â£10.9bn Covid scheme fraud 'beyond recovery', report says
item.description: The response to the pandemic led to "enormous outlays of public money which exposed it to the risk of fraud and error", a report says.

item.title: EU investigates Google over AI-generated summaries in search results
item.description: It is examining whether the tech giant did not offer "appropriate compensation" to web publishers.

item.title: England need to win next Test or Ashes will get embarrassing - McGrath
item.description: Australia legend Glenn McGrath says England must now know they need to adapt their approach and win the third Test in Adelaide or they could be facing...

item.title: Two charged over Heathrow suitcase robbery and suspected pepper spray attack
item.description: Police say a substance was used when a woman's suitcase taken in a car park lift on Sunday.

item.title: Celtic legend Deans dies aged 79
item.description: Former Motherwell, Celtic and Scotland striker John 'Dixie' Deans has died aged 79.
